views.markdown:
Added missing filter plist. This addressed a problem with the tweak being loaded into all processes by mistake - now it will only load into UIKit processes. (repo maintainer) I made a typo, wouldn't let users on iOS 7.0.x install the tweak - should be fixed now.

Massive update!

Revamped Settings page!

More apps - Twitter, Instagram, Facebook and Facebook Messenger with WhatsApp, Waze, Viber and Skype partially supported!

More options! You now have the ability to choose what the app tracks and what it doesn't. All changes require a respring.
